title: Why Teams Are Ditching DynamoDB
author: Felipe Cardeneti Mendes; Guilherme Nogueira
description: Companies sometimes need lower latency, lower costs (especially as they scale) or the ability to run their applications somewhere other than AWS.
cntitle: 团队放弃 DynamoDB 的原因
cndescription: 公司有时需要更低的延迟、更低的成本（尤其是在扩展时）或能够在其AWS以外的地方运行其应用程序。
